pages.text:
March 2020 County of Marin EMS M 5
SEVERE NAUSEA/VOMITING
Indications
• Severe nausea
• Intractable vomiting
• Patients ≥ 4 years of age
• Motion sickness
ALS RMC
• Zofran 4mg ODT/IM or slow IV/IO
over 30 seconds
MR x1 in 10 min
•
If nausea due to motion sickness
• Consider Benadryl 50mg IV/IO/IM
CRITICAL INFORMATION
• Zofran contraindicated in patients with known
sensitivity to Zofran or other 5-HT3 antagonists:
• Granistron (Kytril)
• Dolasetron (Anzemet)
• Palonosetron (Aloxi)
